name: Blue Ice Koala Rope Bag
description: Keep all your gear together to and from the crag. The Koala rope bag has plenty of room to hold your rope, shoes, harness and draws, and the closing system dumps the rope right into the bag when it's time to leave the crag, without any rolling or stuffing. A unique webbing strap can be hung at a multipitch belay to keep your rope contained and tangle-free.Tough nylon ripstop handles rough ground or being stuffed in a backpack.Integrated tarp with coloured handles keeps your rope out of the dirt.Zippered pocket keeps essentials separate.Wide webbing shoulder strap for comfortable carrying.
